name: 01 Test workflow config
description: Test workflow configuration for assets deployment

steps.name: Test first step
steps.instructions: Please get assets from the location: {customer_id} and copy them to the git repo folder.
steps.completion: User has to confirm that they copied the assets to the git repo folder.

steps.name: Assets build job
steps.instructions: Please run the build job for the assets in the git repo folder then provide it to build-assets-location property.

steps.name: Create Ask Now Ticket
steps.instructions: Please create an Ask Now ticket with the provided ticket number: {ticket_number} and ensure the built assets are attached.
steps.completion: User has to confirm that they created the Ask Now ticket with the built assets attached.
